WRITING.TITLE: Illuminati Blueberries, Copic and ink, a4

WRITING.TEXT: Thank you
It dosent really mean anything but it kicks of a song that stays in your head haha.
Actually it was more the prhase Lana Banana from american horror story that has haunted me for a long time, And in some weird way I guess influenced this. :p
It depends, if you are still learning about colors then I would paint digitally instead, or use cheap staedtler pencils (I use them).
I don't draw inspiration, I AM THE INSPIRATION! Okey just kidding but no, I did not draw inspiration from that. I usually try to blank my mind as much as possible before I draw stuff.
I am a tattoo artist working in Tokyo;)
Jag har det bra tack :) Thank you, I do not take any commissions atm but thank you for shown interest :)
Haha I appretiate your angryness

Be as talkative as you like :) I love hearing what people appreciate about my drawings because what I like and what the viewers like seems to be totally different. I'm almost always supprised when something gets popular as I might not like the drawing at all. The chopstick/fish as an example is one I personally don't like. As for the 80's super polished robot, I might do that someday soon. Thank you for sharing your thoughts :)

Thank you and man I miss Invader Zim haha. I have already done some roboty stuff, if you look at my instagram I just recently did somekind of a robot boat and bird thingy :) https://www.instagram.com/thedeadpigeon/
Or maybe you where thinking about some other type of robot?
Thanks man, Im glad that you like it and that you notice all of those aspects of the drawing.
Thank you, it sort of just happened :)
No need to agree with my personal opinion. You can only see half of the drawing here so they would be on the other part haha. However, there are no udders tbh ;)

I usually prefer drawing traditionally as doing stuff digitally sort of kills the soul of a drawing in my opinion. However I made this on my ipad pro and I sort of wanted to share it to see what you think.
Thank you! That means a lot to me :)

WRITING.TITLE: Battle Bird III, Copic Ink, A4

WRITING.TEXT: Well, I live in Japan and my family dosent, As I'm Swedish I celebrate christmas on the 24th, however today I found out that my favorit uncle died yesterday and now I'm not really sad, just a bit empty and decided to try and fill the void with reddit. Merry Christmas.
I think this reflects my state of mind perfectly at the moment.

WRITING.TITLE: Winter is Coming, Copics and Ink, A4

WRITING.TEXT: A bit of a late answer but I wanted to get some time with the game, so yes I bought infinite air because I was suspecting that people who dont understand how jumping works on a snowboard hates the controls and yes that is sort of the case. I have been snowboarding 2/3 of my life and had no problem understanding the controls as they are sort of accurate when it comes to flips and so on. My problem with the game compared to Amped 2 is that there is no real progression, its feels empty, lonely and a little pointless when I play it. I mean I like it and it fills a need but its lacking on the fun factor. Also the constant frame drops, popping in trees and epileptic powder snow doesn't really help. I wish the developers would watch Shredbots the movie 20 times in a row and then release a huge patch to the game haha. Either that or I wish steep would have a baby with infinite air.
Same here, I would not even call SSX a Snowboarding game, My favorit of all time was amped 2.

After a frustrating half hour with the game I didn'tt have any problems doing crazy tribble backflip 1440 dubbel nose grabs and crazy stuff like that. However it feels super weird, it feels like the developers have no idea how jumping on a snowboard works and the whole trick system is just horrible. Overall the game just feels unfun as you said. It got no soul whatsoever, however I also think SSX is a horrible Snowboard game but that is a discussion we dont need to get into :P
I have been thinking about this for a while aswell. I totally agree.
no problem, I might have to upload a straight one tomorrow when I wake up. :)
Oh, this got nothing to do with the movies by the way.
Just by looking at game footage you can tell that the game physics are pretty horrible :( I'm guessing 6/10
Yepp that is what I think, I have yet to hear an iphone 7 that dosen't make the sound.

Mine is so loud that I can hear it during phone calls and it's clearly noticable in recorded video, it is always making the sound... even during no load at all. Here is the thing :p One of my work colleagues dosen't hear the sound at all when pressing my phone to her ear. Some people can't hear these kind of high pitched sounds, I am however super sensitiv to it and can even hear my iphone 7 sound in a silent room when the phone is 1 meter away from me.
It feels like I should say something...
nothing fancy at all, I can only get them when I am in Sweden as it's just some office supply's companys sketchbook
Holy shit, thanks!
Thank you!
Thank you!
Thank you! If you have a look at my website you might find what your looking for ;)

Thank you
